lead_paragraph: The rules, built in to many financial agreements like credit cards and student loans, affect tens of millions of consumers, but may be limited in the future.

headline.main: Binding Arbitration Rules Get Consumer Protection Bureau Scrutiny

keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
